titleStmt.title: Commonwealth of Kentucky v. Elam Bowling et al., Indictment
CWG1043

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Governor's Official Correspondence File, Apprehension of Fugitives from Justice Papers, 1863-1867

body.p:
Laurel Circuit Court
The Commonwealth of Kentucky
against } Indictment
Elam Bowling Hugh Bowling & Isham Bowling

The Grand Jury of Laurel County in the name and by the authority of the Commonwealth of Ky accus Elam Bowling Hughe Bowling and Isham Bowling of the crime of murder committed as follows to wit the said Elam Bowling Hughe Bowling & Isham Bowling on the 6th of January 1860 in the county aforesaid did unlawfully and with malice afore thought kill and murder Arnold Kirby by stabbing him with a knife or some other Sharp Instrument against the peace and dignity of the commonwealth of Kentucky

Witnesses
P L Johnson
Hue Cordell
Martin Asher
Stephin Langly
Jefferson Johnson
Alfred Girtman
James Evans
L B Nichlesan
James Weaver
James Hodge
Even Jones
Robt Asher
David Weaver

A Copy.
Att John Pitman clk
